item.title: Tile shape matching algorithm
item.description: 8:27 Thursday 21 December 2017 -03 I am making a swipe game which requires the user to swipe specific shapes. XX XX or XXXX or X X X X excetera (haha) I will have a list of tile coordinates which were swiped. (3,3) (3,4) (3,5) (3,6) Above coordinates would match the horizontal XXXX (or is it vertical? Anyway,) I can imagine comparing the above list to a list calculated from
